effect.name: TAP AutoPanner
effect.description:
TAP AutoPanner (LADSPA 2146)
Main use is to liven up synth tracks in the mix
effect.author: http://www.ladspa.org

parameter.name: Depth
parameter.comment:
Sets the wideness of panning.
A setting of 100% means that mono input signal is panned between the extreme left and right positions
